tourBios.carHigh:
2011: Alternated time between the eGolf Professional Tour and the Sunshine Tour...Represented Zimbabwe at the OMEGA Mission Hills World Cup. Teamed with Brendon de Jonge to T11 at Mission Hills GC in Hainan Island, China.

2010: Alternated time between the eGolf Professional Tour and the Sunshine Tour.

2009: Played on the Tarheel Tour.

2008: Played on the Tarheel Tour.

2007: Played on the NGA Pro Golf Tour. 

2006: Played on the NGA Pro Golf Tour.

2005: Played on the NGA Pro Golf Tour.

2004: Rookie of the Year on the NGA Pro Golf Tour. Won the Valdosta Classic in South Georgia.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was a second-team All-American in 2003 with three college wins. Was a member of the All-Southern Conference team for the 2002-03 season.
tourBios.prYrSeason: Earned conditional status on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica after losing a three-man playoff for the 15th spot at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Doral Q-School

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T3rd in 2012 at the Arturo Calle Colombian Coffee Classic presented by Avianca.
